org.apache.giraph.comm.aggregators

类 AggregatorUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.comm.aggregators.AggregatorUtils

  • public class AggregatorUtils
extends Object
    Class for aggregator constants and utility methods

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static String MAX_BYTES_PER_AGGREGATOR_REQUEST
      How big a single aggregator request can be (in bytes)
      static int MAX_BYTES_PER_AGGREGATOR_REQUEST_DEFAULT
      Default max size of single aggregator request (1MB)
      static String SPECIAL_COUNT_AGGREGATOR
      Special aggregator name which will be used to send the total number of aggregators requests which should arrive
      static String USE_THREAD_LOCAL_AGGREGATORS
      Whether or not to have a copy of aggregators for each compute thread.
      static boolean USE_THREAD_LOCAL_AGGREGATORS_DEFAULT
      Default is not to have a copy of aggregators for each thread

      Create new aggregator instance from aggregator class, catch all exceptions.
      static boolean useThreadLocalAggregators(ImmutableClassesGiraphConfiguration conf)

    • 字段详细资料

      • SPECIAL_COUNT_AGGREGATOR

        public static final String SPECIAL_COUNT_AGGREGATOR
        Special aggregator name which will be used to send the total number of aggregators requests which should arrive
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • MAX_BYTES_PER_AGGREGATOR_REQUEST

        public static final String MAX_BYTES_PER_AGGREGATOR_REQUEST
        How big a single aggregator request can be (in bytes)
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • MAX_BYTES_PER_AGGREGATOR_REQUEST_DEFAULT

        public static final int MAX_BYTES_PER_AGGREGATOR_REQUEST_DEFAULT
        Default max size of single aggregator request (1MB)
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • USE_THREAD_LOCAL_AGGREGATORS

        public static final String USE_THREAD_LOCAL_AGGREGATORS
        Whether or not to have a copy of aggregators for each compute thread. Unless aggregators are very large and it would hurt the application to have that many copies of them, user should use thread-local aggregators to prevent synchronization when aggregate() is called (and get better performance because of it).
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • USE_THREAD_LOCAL_AGGREGATORS_DEFAULT

        public static final boolean USE_THREAD_LOCAL_AGGREGATORS_DEFAULT
        Default is not to have a copy of aggregators for each thread
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

    • 方法详细资料

      • getAggregatorClass

        public static Class<Aggregator<org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>> getAggregatorClass(String aggregatorClassName)
        Get aggregator class from class name, catch all exceptions.
        参数:
        aggregatorClassName - Class nam of aggregator class
        返回:
        Aggregator class

      • newAggregatorInstance

        public static Aggregator<org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable> newAggregatorInstance(Class<Aggregator<org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>> aggregatorClass,
                                                              ImmutableClassesGiraphConfiguration conf)
        Create new aggregator instance from aggregator class, catch all exceptions.
        参数:
        aggregatorClass - Class of aggregator
        conf - Configuration
        返回:
        New aggregator

      • getOwner

        public static WorkerInfo getOwner(String aggregatorName,
                  List<WorkerInfo> workers)
        Get owner of aggregator with selected name from the list of workers
        参数:
        aggregatorName - Name of the aggregators
        workers - List of workers
        返回:
        Worker which owns the aggregator

      • useThreadLocalAggregators

        public static boolean useThreadLocalAggregators(ImmutableClassesGiraphConfiguration conf)
        Check if we should use thread local aggregators.
        参数:
        conf - Giraph configuration
        返回:
        True iff we should use thread local aggregators

      • getUnregisteredAggregatorMessage

        public static String getUnregisteredAggregatorMessage(String aggregatorName,
                                      boolean hasRegisteredAggregators,
                                      ImmutableClassesGiraphConfiguration conf)
        Get the warning message about usage of unregistered aggregator to be printed to user. If user didn't register any aggregators also provide the explanation on how to do so.
        参数:
        aggregatorName - The name of the aggregator which user tried to access
        hasRegisteredAggregators - True iff user registered some aggregators
        conf - Giraph configuration
        返回:
        Warning message
